participant_1.background:
I want to relocate to a place where I can start my own business.
my last name is spanish , but i tell people that it s italian.
i am short.
I'm a great storyteller, and I use that to make friends and get to know my family.
I play music to cheer myself up.

participant_2.background:
I was a country singer before I went into business.
i am a weirdo.
I'm lucky to have such a great dog to share my life with.
pizza is my most favorite thing.
I watched a lot of sports last year and kept my home clean and tidy.

content.text: Hello! Nice to meet you too. I'm a country singer turned business owner.
Wow, that's impressive! I used to play music but never took it seriously.
Well, I'm a weirdo so it was a good fit for me.
Haha, I'm short and I tell people that my last name is Italian, but it's actually Spanish.
That's funny, I'm tall and I tell people I'm a midget.
Haha, it's nice to meet someone who also likes to play music and has a funny personality.
Same here! I'm glad we're both into pizza too.
I love pizza! What's your favorite kind?
That's a weird combination, but I love it too!
Me too! It's the perfect combination of sweet and salty.
I agree! We should get pizza together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free on Saturday.
Me too! I'll bring the music and you bring the pizza.
